"Where's the Chocolate? 2016":
"This is an unofficial request from me, Xie!
The girls are giving out handmade
chocolates again this year...
But it seems like the smell of chocolate
attracted a ton of enemies!
The girls are in trouble! Can you help them?
――――――――――――――――――――
Fail: Time limit expires"

"While giving out chocolates, one of
the girls spotted an unfamiliar enemy."

"The sweet smell of chocolate
must have lured it in, and now
it's chasing the girls! To think,
betrayed by chocolate..."

"We can't just leave it down there
with them, so get down there and
stop it! And watch your own backs!"
